education.title: Education &
education.subtitle: My academic journey and continuous training in software engineering, security, and modern technologies.

ubiobio-2025.description: Specialized program in the Secure Software Development Life Cycle (SSDLC), focused on integrating security practices from requirements analysis to deployment and maintenance, applying DevSecOps principles.

mongodb-udemy-2024.description: Comprehensive MongoDB course focused on designing, querying, and optimizing NoSQL databases, covering fundamentals through advanced operations and data modeling.

mongodb-intro-2024.description: Introductory course providing MongoDB fundamentals, including document structure, collections, basic queries, and essential NoSQL database concepts.

scrum-2024.description: Certification in Scrum fundamentals focused on agile methodologies, roles, events, and artifacts, aimed at efficient software development project management.

upc-2023.description: Software Engineering degree focused on the design, development, and maintenance of technological solutions, with emphasis on software architecture, backend development, and mobile applications.

hacking-2022.description: Ethical Hacking course focused on vulnerability identification, penetration testing, and cybersecurity fundamentals, applying offensive techniques with a defensive mindset.

contact.title: Have a project in mind?
contact.subtitle: I'm available for new projects and collaborations. Feel free to reach out and let's work together on something amazing.

form.title: Send me a message
form.description: Fill out the form and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
form.name: Full name
form.subject: Subject
form.success: Message sent successfully! I'll respond soon.
form.error: There was an error sending the message. Please try again.

errors.nameMin: Name must be at least 2 characters

footer.tagline: Web developer passionate about creating exceptional digital experiences. Transforming ideas into clean and functional code.
